Title: Leadership Can Be Uncomfortable
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about:

•       How to coach an employee who needs to improve in their job performance

•       The best way to pass your business to family without financially screwing them

•       How to know when you should buy new or used equipment for your business

•       What to do when family members work for you but are continually misbehaving
